item.title: Learning Python!
item.description: It is possible to do most if not all the things that we did this semester in Rstudio in python. Below I will show functions that were done in my projects and try to recreate them in python. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.0 v purrr 0.3.3 ## v tibble 3.0.0 v dplyr 0.8.5 ## v tidyr 1.0.2 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.
